a61ad0e0-9d91-4b73-acbb-db2787aed2a3-371283-nottcity001-dn471087-11845464,2020-07-20T08:43:03Z,Nottingham City Council,,,Nottingham,Arden Winch & Co.Ltd,,,,,,S9 4LR,2020-07-14T00:00:00Z,2020-07-20T00:00:00Z,2024-07-19T00:00:00Z,"CPU 3349 supply and delivery of  Workwear, PPE, Uniforms & Tools","1.1.1
column2: Nottingham City Council (hereafter 'the Authority') is seeking tenders from sufficiently experienced and qualified suppliers to establish a framework agreement for the supply and delivery of Workwear, Personal Protective Equipment, Uniforms and Tools. The Authority's detailed requirements are defined in the Service Specification outlined in Section 4 of the Invitation to Tender Document.
The Lots sought under this contract are:
Lot 3 will cover Personal Protective Equipment (PPE)
In addition to Nottingham City Authority (NCITY), the following organisations will be able to call off the Framework as required (referred to as 'the Customer'):
Schools, Academies or Children's Centres within Nottingham City and County
Nottingham Highways Limited and any other Nottingham City Council owned company

ee8bbc12-98d0-4ad9-b2b3-83cc02fa815c-371930-nottcity001-dn475980-82121880,2020-07-22T17:08:36Z,Nottingham City Council,,,Nottingham,Willis Jenkins Ltd,,,,,,16, Weston Barns, SG4 7AX",2020-07-15T00:00:00Z,2020-08-03T00:00:00Z,2020-11-30T00:00:00Z,CPU4031_Nottingham Castle Commercial Kitchens_Lot 01 - Turnkey Solutions,"A call for further competition between the Contractors awarded places on Lot 1 (Turnkey Solutions) of ESPO Framework 98 - Commercial Catering Equipment, Nottinghamshire Suppliers, in accordance with the Framework Agreement.

The appointed Contractor will undertake the fit out of two Commercial Kitchens to include minor building works with supply and installation of catering equipment for the Nottingham Castle Development as set out in the Statement of Requirements",,,,,244717.0,GBP
